title: Voice Commands for Daily Task Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to manage my daily tasks so that I can maintain my independence and stay organized without struggling with physical limitations.

title: Natural Language Understanding for Daily Task Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to use simple voice commands to manage my daily tasks, so that I can stay organized and connected without struggling with technology.

title: Voice Confirmation for Task Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to receive voice confirmations after I issue commands to ALFRED so that I feel assured that my tasks, such as setting reminders or making calls, have been executed correctly.

title: Simplified Voice Commands for Daily Task Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to use simple voice commands to manage my daily tasks so that I can stay organized and maintain my independence without struggling with technology.

title: Enhanced Voice Command Support for Daily Task Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to manage my daily tasks so that I can stay organized and connected without needing to navigate complex technology.

title: Voice Interaction Accessibility Features for Enhanced Independence
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to perform daily tasks easily so that I can stay independent and connected despite my mobility challenges.

title: Guided Assistance for Error Recovery
summary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to guide me through error recovery when I encounter issues using the system, so that I can maintain my independence and continue to use the assistant without frustration.

title: Customizable Voice Interactions for Enhanced Communication
summary: As an older adult, I want to customize my voice interactions with ALFRED so that I can communicate easily and effectively with my family and friends.

title: Voice Command Task Execution
summary: As an older adult, I want to use voice commands to manage my daily tasks so that I can maintain my independence and stay connected with my family and community without struggling with technology.

title: Customizable Voice Commands for Easier Daily Task Management
summary: As an older adult, I want to customize voice commands so that I can easily manage my daily tasks without having to remember complex commands.
